name: Nikhil Barik
bio: Software Engineer at Yahoo. Loves FOSS.

links.name: GitHub: Let's work on some projects

milestones.title: Project Admin - Kharagpur Winter of Code

milestones.description: Our team Zigbee stood at 659th position.

milestones.title: Instructor - Cross Platform Mobile App Development with Flutter

milestones.title: Became GoogleCloudReady Facilitator

milestones.title: Mentored at GSSoC 2021
milestones.description: For the project Awesome Chrome Extensions by Riddhi Suteri. Responsible for assigning issues, merging PRs, code review and feedback, resolving doubts of contributors on Discord.

milestones.title: Founded Zigbee Student Developers' Club
milestones.description: Built our new club to promote competitive atmosphere for developers, designers in the campus organizing workshops on Git/Github, Contributing to Open Source,and so on parterning with orgs such as Major League Hacking, CodeforCause, Miceosoft Learn Student Ambassadors.

milestones.title: Interned as a Mobile Developer at Lecturenotes.in
